players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was killed, so mafia is Bob. Diana is detective."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he's mafia. He killed Charlie. Thank you, Alice."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe the detective was mistaken. I'm not mafia."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. Alice said I'm mafia, but maybe she is. Vote for Alice."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night; he's mafia. He denies killing Charlie, but that's typical mafia behavior. Vote Bob."
You: "I support Diana: Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was killed, so mafia is Bob. Diana is detective."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he's mafia. He killed Charlie. Thank you, Alice."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe the detective was mistaken. I'm not mafia."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. Alice said I'm mafia, but maybe she is. Vote for Alice."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night; he's mafia. He denies killing Charlie, but that's typical mafia behavior. Vote Bob."
Alice: "I support Diana: Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was killed, so mafia is Bob. Diana is detective."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he's mafia. He killed Charlie. Thank you, Alice."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe the detective was mistaken. I'm not mafia."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. Alice said I'm mafia, but maybe she is. Vote for Alice."
You: "I investigated Bob last night; he's mafia. He denies killing Charlie, but that's typical mafia behavior. Vote Bob."
Alice: "I support Diana: Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
